column1: The key to unlocking a flourishing footwear rotation? Versatility and variety. Our assortment of men's shoes allows you to maximize these crucial aspects when assembling your sneaker collection. Because your life moves at different speeds, it only makes sense you can switch up your style to match each moment. Starting your day with a morning run? Never settle for anything short of peak performance and shop from running favorites like the On Cloudmonster running shoes for plush cushioning or the Nike Free Run 5.0 for a more stripped-down approach. Take a break and settle into your day with casual shoes like the New Balance 327 or Nike Air Max 97 for a clean, timeless look that pairs perfectly with just about anything in your closet. Head to the court and shoot some hoops in sneakers basketball superstars wear, like the Jordan Tatum 1 or adidas Harden Vol. 7 Basketball Shoes. Afterward, slip into your go-to slides and sandals from Crocs or Birkenstock for instant casual comfort. At JD Sports, we've got you covered with the best of the best for every activity in a seemingly endless assortment of colors so you can take on every task teeming with confidence.

Make running on any surface feel like running on the clouds with the On Cloudmonster sneakers! Inspired by athletes and powered by Swiss engineering to ignite the human spirit through movement, the incredibly comfortable On Cloudmonster brings together innovative specs and state-of-the-art technology to deliver max cushioning for a running experience unlike any other. Boasting a bigger-than-ever CloudTec cushioning system that absorbs impact, reduces strain and adapts to your running style while propelling you forward, the Cloudmonster creates a soft sensation whether getting your miles in on the treadmill or pounding the pavement. Lightweight yet durable and temperature-resistant mesh on the upper straps you in for the ride and feels fantastic at any pace for versatile performance. An ultra-powerful Speedboard ensures extremely soft landings and maximum rebound for peak energy return. Take your running sessions to new heights and elevate your running shoe rotation with the On Cloudmonsters, available in men’s and women’s sizing at JD Sports.

Spruce up your sporty, everyday look with the instant-classic New Balance 327 Casual Sneakers from JD Sports! Available in men’s, women’s, and kids’ sizing, the archive-inspired New Balance 327 brings old-school style with a modern approach for an always on-point look for the whole family. Designed by Charlotte Lee and debuting in 2020, the New Balance 327 immediately stirred up buzz for its familiar-yet-undeniably unique aesthetic. With plenty of collaborations from the hottest names in footwear under its belt, the 327 has secured its spot as one of the most groundbreaking designs in recent sneaker history. Arriving in fresh colorways like Sea Salt and Moonbeam, along with classic white, grey, and black color schemes, the New Balance 327 sneakers deliver a mix of fun color-blocking just begging to finish off a color-coordinated fit and versatile looks for low-key, everyday wear. Pick up a pair (or two, or three) of the New Balance 327 from JD today to stock up on sneakerhead-approved silhouettes with daring details to level up your look.

If you're looking for a new pair of sandals that are comfortable, classic and versatile, look no further than Birkenstock, which has been creating stylish yet laid-back sandals since the late 1800s. The Birkenstock sandal comes in a range of models, sizes and colors for women and men, and now they're available at JD Sports in stores and online. Perhaps the most iconic and recognizable Birkenstock sandal of all is the Birkenstock Arizona, a design featuring two upper straps and a reliable, comfortable cork-latex footbed. The footbed is the contoured base of the Arizona and other Birkenstock sandals and is made from layers of material that form a custom footprint the more often it is worn. The Birkenstock footbed literally molds to your foot over time, creating a custom fit for comfort in every step.

While you may be most familiar with the Arizona sandal featuring earthy tones and leather uppers, there are now many variations to choose from within the Birkenstock range and something to match every occasion and outfit. There are water-friendly options, sandals with different upper colors, materials and even fleecy linings to keep your feet warm. The long-lasting and increasingly comfortable design offers versatile styling and means you’re able to wear them with jeans, shorts, a dress or skirt, whether you’re going out with friends or working in the garden. No matter what you’re looking for in a sandal, Birkenstock has a pair that’ll be just the right fit for your feet. Shop JD Sports today for the latest Birkenstock sandal styles.

Often imitated but never duplicated, the Bruce Kilgore-designed Nike Air Force 1 forever changed the sneaker game when they first hit shelves in 1982. Originally designed as basketball sneakers, the AF1 introduced the game-changing Nike Air to the basketball court, previously appearing only in running shoes. Also referred to as Uptowns, Harlems, Forces, or Ones, the AF1 remains an iconic piece of sneaker and pop culture more than 40 years after debuting. Worn by the stars and name-checked by a who’s who of artists, the Air Force 1 unquestionably resides in the pantheon of iconic sneakers, going mainstream without losing an ounce of street appeal. From the classic white-on-whites to bold and colorful color schemes in Low, Mid, and High silhouettes to contemporary updates like the Nike Air Force 1 Pixel, you can’t go wrong with a pair of AF1s on your feet. Whether shopping for your first pair or looking for the next addition to your extensive collection, you’ve come to the right place to find the AF1s to upgrade your footwear selection into rarefied air.
How do I care for my Air Force 1s?

To keep your Nike Air Force 1s looking fresh, clean them regularly with a soft brush and mild detergent. For leather styles, consider using a leather conditioner to maintain suppleness. Always air dry them and avoid direct sunlight to prevent fading.
Are Nike Air Force 1s comfortable for all day wear?

Absolutely. Nike Air Force 1s boast signature Nike Air technology on the midsoles for all-day support. Nike Air reduces weight without sacrificing performance, making it an ideal choice for casual comfort. Additionally, a durable rubber outsole absorbs shock for a smooth feel wear after wear.
Are Nike Air Force 1s suitable for sports activities?

While originally designed as basketball shoes, Nike Air Force 1s are now more of a lifestyle sneaker. They offer great casual comfort but might lack the specialized support needed for high-intensity sports activities.
Can I wear the Nike Air Force 1s with a variety of outfits?

Undeniably, yes. The Nike Air Force 1s can and should be worn with various outfits. The classic, clean, and crisp appearance is a major reason why the sneaker became and remains an iconic fan favorite to this day. The Air Force 1 remains a go-to casual fashion staple while also appearing at weddings and red carpets, speaking volumes about the endlessly versatile sneakers.
What makes Nike Air Force 1s so popular?

The enduring popularity of Nike Air Force 1s comes from their timeless design, versatility, and association with pop culture. Their ability to blend seamlessly into both casual and upscale fashion ensures they remain a wardrobe staple.
Where did the Nike Air Force 1 name come from?

The Nike Air Force 1 name references Air Force One, the plane the President of the United States uses for safe and reliable travel. Also, it name-checks the groundbreaking Nike Air technology, as the Nike Air Force 1 brought the walking-on-air cushioning technology to the basketball court for the first time.

When chasing your fitness goals, you need the perfect pair of performance footwear to not only withstand your boundary-pushing training sessions but help propel you forward in your pursuit of greatness. Whether your focus is crushing the competition or pushing yourself to new PRs, the right athletic footwear is a non-negotiable necessity when it comes to reaching your peak performance. From high-performance training essentials like the Nike Metcon series designed to be the only pair of sneakers you need for all your gym activities, to the Under Armour Project Rock 5 to help you find your iron paradise and achieve blockbuster results worthy of an action movie star, our selection of training and sports shoes is simply second to none. Prefer a scoreboard and some competition to take on? Our indoor and outdoor soccer cleats from Puma and adidas and baseball cleats help you get a grip and an always-welcomed edge on the opposition. Find the latest and greatest athletic training shoes at JD Sports to stay laced up for the greatness that awaits you.

A men’s training shoe is specifically designed to support a variety of movements, including lateral plyometric exercises, squats, and quick direction changes. These shoes typically feature a flatter sole, lower heel-toe drop, and greater flexibility compared to other athletic footwear. Their design prioritizes stability, making them ideal for a wide range of workout routines.
What is the difference between training shoes and gym shoes?

When it comes to footwear, the distinction between training shoes and gym shoes lies in their design and intended use. At JD Sports, we recognize that while running shoes often feature higher heel drops to offer extra support and cushioning for track runners, training or gym shoes are specifically crafted for multi-directional movements, such as lateral or side-to-side motions.

Cleats serve the purpose of providing traction on soft surfaces such as grass, mud, or field turf. Also known as studs, the protrusions on the bottom of the shoe help prevent slipping and sliding during athletic activities, particularly in outdoor sports like football, soccer, baseball, and rugby.
Should I get the same size cleats as shoes?

When it comes to sizing your soccer cleats, JD Sports recommends starting with your regular shoe size. However, keep in mind that some players, especially elite athletes, prefer a snugger fit for enhanced ball control. Ultimately, finding the perfect fit may involve trying on different sizes to ensure comfort and performance.

The Air Max 97 was the first of its kind in many aspects. Firstly, the sneaker was the first from Nike’s lineup to feature visible Air. You know the stuff: pockets of pressurized air built to provide that springy bounce you know and love from a Nike shoe. But this sneaker was different. Translucent panes gave an inside look at exactly what makes Nike Air so special. Secondly, the Air Max 97 featured a hidden lacing system, never before seen in the industry. With a design inspired by nature, this sneaker has been inspired by and making waves for more than two decades.
AIR MAX 97 SNEAKERS FOR MEN, WOMEN & KIDS

Celebrate the unmatched style and unparalleled comfort of the Nike Air Max 97 today with a little help from JD Sports. With every colorway under the sun available, including the classic all-white and all-black, it’s never been easier to finish off your street-ready ‘fit with the perfect sneaker from your growing collection. On top of the slick fashion sense that’s completed like a cherry on top of a sundae with these killer kicks, experience the ultimate Air cushioning that feels like walking on clouds. While colors and styles have changed over the last two decades, one thing remains the same: visible Air in the heel that provides elastic-like cushioning while reducing impact. Whether you’re a fan of this controversial sneaker or not, one thing is true: the Nike Air Max 97 Casual Shoes stand the test of time as the perfect balance of retro and modern style. Slip into a pair today and experience the Nike Air for yourself, or add a brand-new colorway to your collection to continue to stand out from the crowd.

Q: What are the best basketball shoes for performance?
A: The best basketball shoes offer support, traction, and cushioning. Popular options include Nike LeBron, adidas Harden, and Air Jordan models, favored for their performance and durability on the court.

Q: What type of shoes are best for basketball?
A: Basketball shoes should offer ankle support, cushioning, and a firm grip. High-tops provide extra ankle protection, while mid and low-tops focus more on speed and flexibility.

Q: How are basketball shoes different from regular sneakers?
A: Basketball shoes are designed with extra ankle support, cushioning, and grip to handle the fast-paced movements and jumps of the game, whereas regular sneakers are often more lightweight and casual.

Q: What are the most popular basketball shoes in the NBA?
A: Some of the most commonly worn shoes in the NBA include Nike LeBron, Air Jordan, and the Nike Zoom Freak, worn by top players for their performance and support.

Q: What are the most common basketball shoes used in the NBA?
A: Top NBA players often wear shoes like Nike LeBron, Jordan Retro series, and Nike Giannis Immortality. These shoes are known for their combination of comfort, performance, and style.

Q: Can basketball shoes be worn casually?
A: Absolutely! Many people wear basketball shoes casually, especially models like Air Jordans and Nike Dunks, which have become streetwear staples.

Q: What are some affordable yet well-constructed basketball shoes?
A: Budget-friendly basketball shoes with solid performance include the Nike Giannis Immortality, Nike Renew Elevate, and Nike Court Vision, all known for durability and value.

Nike Dunk in the beginning: Back in 1985, Nike had an idea to bring team colors to the feet of collegiate basketball players and their diehard fans with a new model that would gain some serious heat. The basketball sneaker was the Nike Dunk, and it became the second most popular sneaker that year. Taking design concepts from the Air Force 1 and Air Jordan 1, the Nike Dunk gained its popularity as the College Color High sneaker and became a powerhouse model in the 1980s. For decades, it has continued to hold steady, gracing the feet of everyone from visionaries to rappers to kids on the playground.

Nike Dunk over the years: Dunks are always evolving with numerous collaborations and colorways along the way. From its inception, the Nike Dunk was celebrated for its bold color-blocking. This feature continues to be one of the shoe's most beloved aspects, with fresh new colorways being regularly released.

Nike Dunk now: Back and better than ever, the latest iterations of the Nike Dunk sneakers are in new colors and modern materials to dress up your daily look. Offered in men’s and kids’ sizes, these dunks usher in a new era of throwback-meets-modern kicks. Dunks today aren’t worn on the court, but they still evoke the spirit of the hardwood, weaving a retro high-top silhouette with luxe leather and suede. Dunks can be worn with everything from joggers to basketball shorts to leggings, leveling up any laid-back look. With a rich history, endless design options and a loyal following, Nike Dunk shoes continue to be a must-have in every sneaker collection. Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the world of Nike Dunks, there's no denying the lasting appeal of this iconic shoe.
Are Nike Dunks a basketball shoe or a lifestyle sneaker?

Nike Dunks started as a performance basketball shoe designed in 1985. As basketball tech advanced, the Dunk became less suitable for professional play but gained popularity in skateboarding due to its durable leather construction and comfort. Over the years, it has evolved into a lifestyle sneaker, often featured in high-fashion collaborations and as a staple in casual, stylish footwear.
Are Nike Dunk shoes comfortable for all-day wear?
Yes, Nike Dunk shoes are generally comfortable for all-day wear. They feature a cushioned midsole, a padded collar and a supportive fit, making them suitable for all-day wear.
Do Nike Dunks run true to size?

Nike Dunks typically run true to size, but the fit can vary slightly depending on the model. Check out our size chart or just head to your local JD Sports and try them on in-store for the best fit. Size up a half size for added comfort, if you have wide feet.

Peter C. Moore designed the Nike Dunk as an alternative to the game-changing Air Jordan 1 (also designed by Moore). The Nike Dunk High made its name on the hardwood as a performance basketball shoe. While the Jordan 1 became the starting point for its namesake taking over the pro game, the Dunk took over college basketball.
What is the difference between Nike Dunk and Nike SB Dunk?

The primary difference between Nike Dunk and Nike SB Dunk lies in their design and purpose. While the Nike Dunk was originally designed as a basketball shoe, the Nike SB Dunk was created specifically for skateboarding. Nike SB Dunks feature additional padding in the tongue and collar, a Zoom Air unit in the insole for impact protection and a more durable construction to withstand skateboarding wear and tear.
How do I care for my Nike Dunks?

To keep your Nike Dunks fresh, regularly clean them with a soft brush or cloth. For leather or synthetic uppers, use a mild soap and water solution, while suede versions require a dedicated suede cleaner. Avoid submerging the shoes in water and allow them to air dry naturally. Storing your Nike Dunk shoes in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight will also help preserve their condition.

When technology and style meet at the forefront of sport fashion, you know who to turn to: Nike. Founded in 1964 by the legendary Phil Knight and Bill Bowerman, Nike was first known to the world as Blue Ribbon Sports. The company rebranded in 1971 to Nike, named after the Greek goddess of victory. For decades, Nike has been a leader in sneaker innovation with its start in the running shoe world. But, what really set them apart was the introduction of Nike Air. Air innovation was introduced in 1979 and consists of pockets of pressurized air inside a durable, flexible bag. These units provide an elastic-like feel while reducing hard impact and keeping you light on your feet. Now, Nike Air sits underfoot on dozens of silhouettes, reducing impact, keeping you light on your feet and providing that springy bounce you know and love.

With the introduction and implementation of Air came the line of Nike Air Max sneaker styles. Built for the streets, but offering up the cushioned comfort you love, these sneakers are every streetwear enthusiast’s dream. You’re probably already familiar with the Nike Air Max family, which spans decades of time and includes dozens of silhouettes. Classic sneakers like the Air Max 90 and Air Max 95 live on in infamy, with Nike updating and upgrading styles year-round to keep a fresh outlook on street style. Newer models like the Nike Air Max 270 have changed the game for modern sneakerheads.

Aside from Nike Air, Nike has introduced additional cushioning technology that makes running even more comfortable for veterans and novices alike. From Nike React Foam that’s as resilient as it is lightweight to VaporMax Air that brings the gravity-defying bounce you crave, Nike launches the best of the best. Experience new technology like Nike Joyride, Nike Renew and more in running sneakers that are lightweight, durable and ready to put in the miles. Whether you’re a budding baller who needs a pair of basketball sneakers for the hardwood, a sneakerhead whose shoe collection is never fully complete or a running aficionado who needs the very best technology to help hit new PR’s, shop JD for Nike shoes, sport fashion apparel and accessories to help lead the way.

When it comes to making a bold statement, Dr. Martens boots and shoes from JD Sports are a must-have. Originally designed as a functional work boot, Dr. Martens quickly became a symbol of rebellion, gaining traction in the 1960s as musicians and artists embraced them to honor their working-class roots. By the 70s, these iconic boots were being worn by glam rockers, punks, goths, and more. Today, while still a staple of those subcultures, Dr. Martens has transcended boundaries, making waves in festival fashion with their signature sandals and platform styles. Whether you’re channeling your inner rebel or simply need a stylish pair of Doc Martens boots or sandals for your next adventure, JD Sports has the Dr. Martens shoes to help you stand out while staying effortlessly cool.

Kids' Nike Air Force 1 shoes deliver a timeless blend of style and performance. Since their debut in 1982, these iconic sneakers, designed by Bruce Kilgore, have been a staple in casual wear. JD Sports brings this classic look to a new generation with our selection of Air Force 1 kids' shoes. From classic white/white Air Forces and triple black to the latest AF1 Lows, we have options for every taste. Available in sizes for toddlers, little kids, and big kids, these kids' Nike Air Force 1 shoes are perfect for future sneakerheads. Keep the legacy alive and let your kids step out in style with Kids' Nike Air Force 1 shoes from JD Sports.
What makes kids' Nike Air Force 1 a great choice for children?

Kids' Nike Air Force 1 sneakers are an excellent choice for children due to their blend of comfort, style, and durability. Designed with active kids in mind, these sneakers feature Nike’s signature Air-Sole cushioning, which provides excellent shock absorption and support. The sturdy construction and high-quality materials ensure that the sneakers can withstand everyday wear and tear, making them a practical and reliable option for kids.
How do kids' Nike Air Force 1 compare to other kids' sneakers in terms of comfort?

Kids' Nike Air Force 1 are known for their superior comfort compared to many other kids' sneakers. The Air-Sole cushioning system, which is a hallmark of Nike’s design, helps to absorb impact and reduce foot fatigue. The shoes also feature a padded collar and tongue, which provide additional cushioning around the ankle. This combo makes kids' Nike Air Forces ideal for active kiddos who need support and comfort throughout the day.
How do I know if my child’s Air Force 1s fit properly?

To ensure that kids' Nike Air Force 1 fit properly, measure your child's feet and refer to our size chart for guidance. The sneakers should fit snugly but not too tight, with about a thumb’s width of space between the end of the shoe and your child’s toes. It’s also important to check that the shoes provide adequate support around the ankles and do not cause any discomfort. If possible, have your child try on the sneakers in-store to ensure the best fit and comfort.

What different styles are available for men's Nike Air Forces?

The men's Nike Air Force 1 comes in several styles, including low-top, mid-top, and high-top versions. Each style offers a unique look and level of support. The low-top version is ideal for a sleek, minimalist look, while the mid-top and high-top versions provide additional ankle support and a more predominant look. Additionally, the Air Force 1 is available in a wide range of colorways and materials, from classic all-white and all-black to vibrant and seasonal designs.
Can men's Nike Air Force 1s be customized?

Yes! Nike offers customization options for the men's Air Force 1 through its Nike By You program. This service allows you to personalize various aspects of the sneaker, including color, materials, and even adding unique text or graphics. This customization option enables you to create a one-of-a-kind pair that reflects your personal style and preferences.
What sizes are available for the men's Nike Air Force 1?

For more than three decades, the Nike Air Max has been a constant game-changer in the sneaker landscape. The original model, the 1987 Air Max 1, was the brainchild of legendary sneaker designer Tinker Hatfield. Hatfield, an architect before finding his way to the Swoosh, took what many saw at the time as a gamble by exposing the Air unit in the shoe’s heel, and a legend was born. The Air Max line has evolved since then, but has remained innovative and ahead of its game. The newest addition to the family, the Nike Air Max 2021, brings modern design technology to the table alongside sustainable materials and the iconic Visible Air that sneakerheads have come to know and rely on. The Air Max 2021 combines a split, cored-out foam midsole and collapsible cage with a reshaped Visible Air unit to bring a unique look and feel to a sneaker whose heritage you can immediately recognize. The uppers are built from engineered mesh, woven textiles and no-sew skins and at least 20% recycled material by weight. The Nike Air Max Genome casual sneakers are available at JD Sports stores and online in Men’s, Women’s and Kids’ sizes and a range of colors to suit sneaker rotation. Cop a pair today and add a combination of sneaker heritage and modern styling to your collection of kicks.

For more than three decades, the Nike Air Max has been a constant game-changer in the sneaker landscape. The original model, the 1987 Air Max 1, was the brainchild of legendary sneaker designer Tinker Hatfield. Hatfield, an architect before finding his way to the Swoosh, took what many saw at the time as a gamble by exposing the Air unit in the shoe’s heel, and a legend was born. The Air Max line has evolved since then, but has remained innovative and ahead of its game. The newest addition to the family, the Nike Air Max 2021, brings modern design technology to the table alongside sustainable materials and the iconic Visible Air that sneakerheads have come to know and rely on. The Air Max 2021 combines a split, cored-out foam midsole and collapsible cage with a reshaped Visible Air unit to bring a unique look and feel to a sneaker whose heritage you can immediately recognize. The uppers are built from engineered mesh, woven textiles and no-sew skins and at least 20% recycled material by weight. The Nike Air Max Genome casual sneakers are available at JD Sports stores and online in Men’s, Women’s and Kids’ sizes and a range of colors to suit sneaker rotation. Cop a pair today and add a combination of sneaker heritage and modern styling to your collection of kicks.

What began in 1948 as a German sportswear company has metamorphized into the Puma brand we know today, reigning king in the sportswear world. Through the late 1940s and early 1950s, Puma focused its efforts on football cleats for athletes. However, the introduction of the iconoclastic Puma Formstrip branding in 1958 changed everything. European in nature and boasting sleek designs for tennis and soccer players, Puma clothing and sneakers are performance-driven and eye-catching. While the Formstrip remains today, the sneaker silhouettes have been upgraded to everything from chunky retro-inspired streetwear to Cali-cool vibes that are perfect for everyday casual ‘fits.

Shop JD Sports today for the newest Puma shoes on the market for the entire fam. Available in men’s, women’s and kids’ sizing options, these sneakers are built for all shapes and sizes and come in a variety of silhouettes to suit your individual style. Slip into a chunky Puma RS-X or RS-Fast sneaker for a throwback look and feel that boasts modern materials and midfoot cushioning for all-day comfort. If a classic retro-runner look is more your vibe, try on the Puma Future Rider for size. A sleeker silhouette teams up with bold colorways to bring you a casual sneaker meant to turn heads. Of course, nothing is quite as classic as a pair of Puma Cali shoes. The low-key silhouette is built for everyday casual wear and transitions seamlessly between daily tasks.

Puma apparel from JD Sports is a little bit retro and a whole bunch of bold wrapped up together in a neat and tidy athletic package. Slip into the latest looks today and complete your street-ready ‘fits from the ground-up. Starting with a casual pair of Cali sneakers? Women’s bike shorts and a cropped t-shirt in bright, summery colors are the perfect cherry on top of your sneaker sundae. No chunky pair of RS-X sneakers is complete without a matching set to top it off. Find the latest joggers and hoodies for men today to complete the look from head-to-toe. Comfortable, casual and boasting plenty of those throwback vibes you know and love, shop the latest Puma sneakers and apparel from JD Sports today.

Do you know why walking or running in Nike Air sneakers feels like walking on air? Well, firstly because you are. Secondly, because an aerospace engineer conceptualized the idea. Marion Franklin Rudy pitched the idea of pockets of pressurized air as sneaker cushioning to Nike in the late 70’s. The rest is history. This iconic innovation features pressurized air inside flexible bags underfoot and provides a springy bounce and unprecedented smoothness no matter where your run takes you. Nike Air cushioning is now featured as the primary cushioning on an entire line of Nike sneakers. The Nike Air Max collection spans decades and now includes dozens of silhouettes, many of which were designed by the iconic Tinker Hatfield. What started as a running shoe innovation slowly turned into a streetwear necessity in the 80’s, fueled by pop culture, and namely, hip-hop. Visible Air in the 90’s changed the way consumers looked at sneakers, with giant window pane-like detailing on the midsoles of the Air Max 90 that still holds up to today’s fashion standards.

Arguably the greatest collection of kicks in the sneaker game, Air Max makes everything lighter. Now, with more than 40 years of Air under their belt, Nike continues to innovate and awe the sneakerhead community. Sure, the lightweight, springy bounce that Air provides is nice. But, what sets Nike apart from the crowd is its longstanding value to innovate and collaborate. Step out in Nike Air Max sneakers with sizes for men, women and kids including the longtime favorite Air Max 95. Plus, newer models like the Air Max 270 and Vapormax are making waves and changing the game for modern sneaker lovers everywhere. Nike Air Max encapsulates creativity, revolution and imagination, flawlessly.

The Nike Air Max 270 is a first-of-its-kind sneaker that boasts an oversized Max Air unit that makes a statement as much as it provides that iconic comfort and support you crave. Featuring some vintage inspiration in the form of an exaggerated tongue and tongue logo, these sneakers directly nod to Nike models of yesteryear. This new sneaker model was almost named the Nike Air Max 273, which combines the numerical values of the Air Max 180 and Air Max 93. However, 270 degrees of pure Air cushioning had to get represented, so Nike dubbed this sneaker after all 270 degrees of visible Air at the heel. When you slip into a pair of Nike Air Max 270 sneakers, modernized comfort and plenty of classic touches are at the forefront of your style. While Nike Air was created in the late 70’s and is mostly used for cushioned comfort on performance sneakers, the 270 has taken a reinventive approach. Built for casual, street-ready needs over the typical Nike performance wear, these soon-to-be-classics are making waves in the sneaker industry. Featuring Nike’s largest Air unit to date (32mm), the Air Max 270 is a slick sneaker icon in the making, with the comfort, springy bounce, and above all else, style, you need.

Since the very genesis of the brand, Nike has had a strong athletics heritage. From its humble beginnings selling running shoes under the name Blue Ribbon Sports to the global sportswear giant it is today, Nike sneakers have always been infused with the DNA of sports in its groundbreaking designs. And no sneaker model was more game-changing than the Nike Air Max 1, which first debuted in 1987 and stunned the footwear industry with its now-iconic Visible Air cushioning in the heel.

While running technology has advanced beyond that product line, the Nike Air Max Pre-Day continues to carry the torch of the OG Air Max silhouette in a versatile and stylish casual sneaker in men’s and women’s colorways. The Air Max Pre-Day fuses that classic Nike retro running inspiration with futuristic design lines, as well as a reimagined version of the Visible Air unit that took the sneaker world by storm.

The Air Max Pre-Day sneakers are also created under Nike’s Move To Zero initiative, which aims to reduce production waste through the use of recycled materials. Each pair of Nike Air Max Pre-Day shoes are made with at least 20% recycled material by weight so you’ll feel as good as you look. You can find the latest colorways of the Nike Air Max Pre-Day casual sneakers in men’s and women’s sizing online and in store at JD Sports.

VaporMax Air is the next evolution of Nike Air technology. While Air generally sat inside the midsole for extreme cushioning, VaporMax takes it up a notch as a standalone outsole that does everything in one. This heel-to-toe cushioning is lighter-than-air and provides a gravity-defying bounce that you can feel with every step. Take a peek at the exaggerated lugs on the outsole to see the Air that makes the difference. Once these lugs are pushed to create pressure, the bounce back release is out of this world. Plus, durability isn’t forgotten – these rubber-like pods offer up plenty of traction for everyday wear and tear. Thanks to the innovative VaporMax Air technology, runners can now experience heel-to-toe cushioning that’s soft, springy and lightweight.

Step out in some of Nike’s latest styles, like the VaporMax Plus, VaporMax Flyknit 3, or the Vapormax 2020 and experience Nike’s iconic Air technology in a brand-new way. The VaporMax Flyknit 3 is seven years in the making and offers up premium Nike technologies including VaporMax and a Flyknit upper. Built for runners, this versatile running shoe has a stylish design that has taken the streets by storm, too. The Nike Air VaporMax Plus is a hybrid sneaker that offers up extreme comfort for everyday use and is a direct nod to the Air Max Plus of 1998. Step into a pair of Nike Air VaporMax sneakers and experience the feeling of running on air and unmatched comfort like never before. Wear these icons running, training or on the streets for a standout look that brings the comfort and modern style you crave.

The Air Max 95 is a combination of equal parts functionality and fashion. Designed by Sergio Lozano, this release has spanned more than two decades and still remains a Nike icon. Lozano’s inspiration comes from human anatomy and the Earth’s movement. A rib-like lacing system locks you in for the perfect fit. A layered upper is meant to resemble the eroding earth. Spinal-cord inspiration runs along the midsole. The classic Nike Swoosh is placed unconventionally so as not to distract from the sneaker’s design. But, what makes the Air Max 95 standout from the crowd is its visible Air. Created in the late 70’s and introduced shortly after, Nike Air is a revolution in and of itself. At the time, Nike’s sneakers featured pressurized air pockets under the shoe’s forefoot and heel. The release of the pressure with every step created a springy bounce that has maintained its stature as an iconic cushioning technology for decades. While Nike’s sneakers featured this Air for years before the inception of the Air Max 95, this sneaker was the first to show it off like never before. Visible Air pockets along the midsole showed off just how innovative this technology was while bringing a light and airy feel to a chunky street sneaker. The Air Max 95 not only featured visible Air but was also the first model to feature a black midsole. The original Neon colorway has been released more than ten times. The Nike Air Max collection is inventive, fashion-forward and above all else, comfortable. With dozens of silhouettes, colorways and collaborations, it’s no wonder Nike is at the forefront of the sneaker revolution. Find Air Max 95 sizing options in men’s, women’s and kids’ and outfit the entire fam in a look that gets you noticed on the streets and beyond. Slip into a pair of Air Max 95 sneakers and see for yourself. JD Sports has the classic AM95 sneakers, Air Max 95 Essential, Air Max 95 Utility and so much more to choose from – find your style today.

Nike Air Max Dn shoes are the newest iteration within the Air Max lineup, which is renowned for its innovative use of visible air cushioning. Air Max Dns are designed to be versatile, catering to both athletic and casual styles. From light sports activities to everyday wear, the Dn's comfortable fit and resilient cushioning make it the perfect shoe for day-to-night wear.
What does ""Dn"" stand for in Nike Air Max Dn?

The ""Dn"" in Nike Air Max Dn stands for ""Day/Night,"" indicating the shoes feature design elements that are suitable for different times of the day and under different lighting conditions. The design often features bold, reflective materials and vibrant color contrasts to emphasize this dual-time concept.
What is unique about the Air Max Dn's design?
Nike Air Max Dn shoes often feature a bold, visually striking design with reflective elements and a color scheme that enhances visibility and aesthetics during both day and night.
What type of cushioning does the Air Max Dn have?

Like other Air Max models, the Air Max Dn features Nike’s signature visible Air Cushioning Technology, which provides superior comfort and shock absorption through air units that can be seen in the sole of the shoe.
Are Nike Air Max Dn shoes suitable for athletic activities?
Primarily designed for casual wear and lifestyle use, Air Max Dn shoes incorporate sufficient cushioning and support to be used for light athletic activities, making them versatile for everyday use.
Where can I buy Nike Air Max Dn shoes?
Find the freshest Nike Air Max Dn shoes right here at JD Sports.

Shop JD Sports for the latest adidas NMD shoes, available in a wide range of silhouettes, colorways and sizes for men, women and kids. Cushioned comfort comes directly from the BOOST midsole that provides energy return and a bouncy comfort you can feel with each and every step.

Short for “Nomad,” the adidas Originals NMD is truly that with different interpretations over the years, like the adidas NMD_R1 or NMD R2, team up with global collaboration to bring you a sneaker that nods to the past while maintaining bold and modern style. Born out of an appreciation for bold '80s style and archival silhouettes like the Boston Super, the Micropacer and the Rising Star, adidas NMD shoes are an evolution of streetwear meant to be worn, well, however you see fit.

A truly nomadic sensation, the NMD has progressed through collaborations across the globe yielding many interpretations as an iconic lifestyle shoe. The unique and distinct look of the NMD can be seen with its combination of innovative adidas technlogies like the Primeknit upper that provides a secure & comfortable sock-like fit and its responsive BOOST midsole cushioning for optimal energy return.
Are adidas NMD shoes good for running?

While NMD sneakers feature a Boost midsole, they are designed more for exploring the streets as a lifestyle shoe rather than pounding the pavement as a running shoe. The NMD_R1 can hold its own for the occasional jog, but if you are looking for an adidas running shoe then you can’t go wrong with adidas Ultraboost.
Can I use adidas NMDs as gym shoes?

If you are looking for a top performance training shoe for Crossfit, HIIT or Olympic lifts then you’re better off going with an adidas training shoe like the Adizero or Powerlift 4. But as a basic gym shoe that you can wear in the gym and as a daily casual shoe, then the NMD_R1 will work just fine. Pair them with your workout gear or simply rock them on the streets – either way, you’ll feel the comfort and love the look of the adidas NMD.

Step into the future of NMD comfort and style with the adidas NMD_S1 shoes. The adidas NMD_S1 is the next step in the evolution of the adidas NMD line. It features a legendarily comfortable Primeknit upper, encapsulated BOOST cushioning with midsole plugs, rope laces, and a unique, tooth-like rubber outsole to finish the look off. Cop a pair from JD Sports today and experience the future of adidas NMD style for yourself.

Short for “Nomad,” the adidas Originals NMD is truly that with different interpretations over the years, like the adidas NMD_R1 or NMD R2, team up with global collaboration to bring you a sneaker that nods to the past while maintaining bold and modern style. Born out of an appreciation for bold '80s style and archival silhouettes like the Boston Super, the Micropacer and the Rising Star, adidas NMD shoes are an evolution of streetwear meant to be worn, well, however you see fit.
What makes adidas NMD shoes unique?

A truly nomadic sensation, the NMD has progressed through collaborations across the globe yielding many interpretations as an iconic lifestyle shoe. The unique and distinct look of the NMD can be seen with its combination of innovative adidas technlogies like the Primeknit upper that provides a secure & comfortable sock-like fit and its responsive BOOST midsole cushioning for optimal energy return.
Are adidas NMD shoes good for running?

While NMD sneakers feature a Boost midsole, they are designed more for exploring the streets as a lifestyle shoe rather than pounding the pavement as a running shoe. The NMD_R1 can hold its own for the occasional jog, but if you are looking for an adidas running shoe then you can’t go wrong with adidas Ultraboost.
Can I use adidas NMDs as gym shoes?

If you are looking for a top performance training shoe for Crossfit, HIIT or Olympic lifts then you’re better off going with an adidas training shoe like the Adizero or Powerlift 4. But as a basic gym shoe that you can wear in the gym and as a daily casual shoe, then the NMD_R1 will work just fine. Pair them with your workout gear or simply rock them on the streets – either way, you’ll feel the comfort and love the look of the adidas NMD.

Step into the future of NMD comfort and style with the adidas NMD_S1 shoes. The adidas NMD_S1 is the next step in the evolution of the adidas NMD line. It features a legendarily comfortable Primeknit upper, encapsulated BOOST cushioning with midsole plugs, rope laces, and a unique, tooth-like rubber outsole to finish the look off. Cop a pair from JD Sports today and experience the future of adidas NMD style for yourself.

“Radical change often comes about when trying to solve a simple problem. Our original goal was to improve endurance race times by designing a shoe to go downhill faster. In doing so, we inadvertently reinvented the running shoe.” –HOKA Co-Founders

HOKA was founded in the French Alps, when some pioneering trail runners wanted to design a shoe that made downhill running easier. Inspired by the geometries of gravity sports equipment, like skis and mountain bikes, they tinkered with designs until the first HOKA prototype was developed. That first oversized midsole sent shock waves through the running industry, which at the time was in the throes of the minimalist movement. Yet slowly but surely—and then not so slowly—the brand gained traction with consumers who enjoyed the enhanced cushion and uniquely smooth ride the shoes provided. Today, HOKA continues to put its most innovative foot forward in developing bold and unexpected solutions for world champions, taste makers, and everyday athletes.

At HOKA, our goal is to inspire people to move. We want to empower all athletes to act fearlessly and creatively, to drive forward with purpose and passion – and with an “always-on” mindset for innovation and thinking outside the box, we craft bold and unexpected new solutions for athletes of all types.

We aim to amplify all voices and help empower access to running, walking, fitness and the outdoors. We believe everyone is an athlete. And, however you find joy in movement, HOKA is here to propel you forward.

Continue reading about HOKA shoes on the JD Sports US Blog.

What began in 1948 as a German sportswear company has metamorphized into the Puma brand we know today, reigning king in the sportswear world. Through the late 1940s and early 1950s, Puma focused its efforts on football cleats for athletes. However, the introduction of the iconoclastic Puma Formstrip branding in 1958 changed everything. European in nature and boasting sleek designs for tennis and soccer players, Puma clothing and sneakers are performance-driven and eye-catching. While the Formstrip remains today, the sneaker silhouettes have been upgraded to everything from chunky retro-inspired streetwear to Cali-cool vibes that are perfect for everyday casual ‘fits.

Shop JD Sports today for the newest Puma shoes on the market for the entire fam. Available in men’s, women’s and kids’ sizing options, these sneakers are built for all shapes and sizes and come in a variety of silhouettes to suit your individual style. Slip into a chunky Puma RS-X or RS-Fast sneaker for a throwback look and feel that boasts modern materials and midfoot cushioning for all-day comfort. If a classic retro-runner look is more your vibe, try on the Puma Future Rider for size. A sleeker silhouette teams up with bold colorways to bring you a casual sneaker meant to turn heads. Of course, nothing is quite as classic as a pair of Puma Cali shoes. The low-key silhouette is built for everyday casual wear and transitions seamlessly between daily tasks.

Puma apparel from JD Sports is a little bit retro and a whole bunch of bold wrapped up together in a neat and tidy athletic package. Slip into the latest looks today and complete your street-ready ‘fits from the ground-up. Starting with a casual pair of Cali sneakers? Women’s bike shorts and a cropped t-shirt in bright, summery colors are the perfect cherry on top of your sneaker sundae. No chunky pair of RS-X sneakers is complete without a matching set to top it off. Find the latest joggers and hoodies for men today to complete the look from head-to-toe. Comfortable, casual and boasting plenty of those throwback vibes you know and love, shop the latest Puma sneakers and apparel from JD Sports today.

When it comes to street smart sneakers, it doesn't get much better than adidas UltraBoost. Built for supreme comfort, the unique adidas Boost sole and Torsion system offer ultimate support on and off the track. With super lightweight flyknit construction, the classic UltraBoost, the 4.0 and Uncaged silhouettes have become a phenomenon. Keep an eye out for exclusive colorways and the latest adidas styles at JD.

A collection of street-smart sneakers designed to take you from casual to performance, the adidas UltraBOOST line is all about functional swag. UltraBOOST running shoes are built with a clean, fresh innovative design that incorporates the iconic BOOST midsole for unparalleled energy return with a plush, springy feel. Built with sustainable Primeblue material to help reduce plastic waste, they feature stabilizing Tailored Fiber Placement stitching for a precise, smooth stride. With a variety of designs made to meet your every demand when it comes to style, feel and fit, the UltraBOOST 21 incorporates a modified Torsion system for an enhanced, responsive run and increased BOOST technology for amplified energy return. The UltraBOOST 4.0 model is made for those with speed in their DNA. Great for jogs, sprints and races, their lightweight ventilated design sticks to tried-and-true features to make you feel like you're running on air. While the UltraBOOST 5.0 design puts comfortable support in the forefront with a snug, sock-like fit and a Stretchweb sole crafted with Continental™ Rubber for natural, grippy traction. No matter what your running style is, UltraBOOST sneakers have you covered. With sizes available for men, kids’ and women, make UltraBOOST sneakers the official family shoe. Designed for function and loved for casual wear, rock them for the ultimate style flex or for performance. With their clean, versatile looks and unparalleled comfort-enhancing technology, shop for classic black, white or neutral tones, amp it up with vibrant pops of color or mix-it-up with bold hues - no matter where you're going, make sure when you step on the scene your drip is comfortably on-point.

Available in sizes for the whole family, the Nike LeBron signature line invites everyone to make their mark on the game like ""the kid from Akron,"" who charted his path to legendary status.

Designed from the ground up for today’s fast-paced game, the Nike LeBron NXXT Gen Basketball Shoes will help you stay one step ahead of your competition while you apply max speed and power on the court. They’re finished off with a traction pattern modeled after Akron, which serves as a nod to LeBron’s roots. Go all out and take your game to the next level with the Nike LeBron NXXT Gen Basketball Shoes.

Experience the sensation of lockdown support with lightweight, superior cushioning with the Nike LeBron Witness 7 Basketball Shoes. Ditching the Zoom Air tech of the previous iterations for visible, full-length Max Air cushioning—LeBron's favorite—provides a bouncy, responsive feel perfect for running the floor and chasing down fast breaks on the defensive end. Lightweight and breathable mesh on the upper teams up with internal webbing and external molding to deliver a snug, locked-down fit so you can unleash explosive moves while staying under total control. Released in an array of familiar and new colorways alike, the Nike LeBron Witness 7 represents LeBron's historic past while pushing forward to become even more legendary.

What do you do once you’ve changed the game? If you’re Stephen Curry, you perfect it and take it even further.

Executing that game plan starts with the UA Curry 11 and Curry 3Z5. The Curry 11 utilizes innovative and totally rubberless Flow outsole technology, providing a lightweight and superior on-court feel that lets you take control like never before without sacrificing speed to gain the ever-important split-second advantage on the opposition. An enhanced upper upgraded with Under Armour’s Warp technology locks you in to support dynamic movements like stutter steps, hesitation dribbles and stop-on-a-dime cuts to get set and fire away from deep. Lightweight and ridiculously grippy, the Curry 3Z5 Basketball Shoes are engineered for advanced lockdown support, quicker cuts, and next-level responsiveness for elite speed and control so you can lock in and cook defenders like Chef Curry. Available in unisex sizes as a part of the Curry brand through Under Armour, the Curry 11 basketball shoes weaponize your game like never before so you can get in the zone quicker and stay in it longer for inevitable heat checks that light up the scoreboard and leave your opponents demoralized.

JD Sports x adidas NBA All-Star Weekend 2024

JD Sports is partnering with adidas during the NBA All-Star Weekend through exclusive releases and partnerships with NBA players and musical artists. There will be customization giveaways, DJ performances, product giveaways and more. It kicks off in-store with an adidas takeover. adidas will also celebrate the NBA All-Star Weekend with the release of the 'All-Star' AE 1, which has a color-shifting upper.

NBA All-Star Weekend is a three-day event that celebrates the game and brings together athletes, influencers and celebrities. The event includes an exhibition, skills challenges, product launches, and exclusive first looks at new footwear and apparel. The 2024 NBA All-Star Weekend will be held in Indianapolis. The All-Star Game format will return to an Eastern vs. Western matchup for the first time since 2017.
The 2024 NBA All-Star Weekend will take place in Indianapolis, Indiana from February 16–18, 2024.

What’s more exciting than copping a freshly dropped sneaker? Nothing, right? So why not protect your investment with Crep Protect's shoe care products sold at JD Sports. With the Crep Protect wipes you’re able to touch up on the go, bring shoes back to life after a day's long-wear using the Crep shoe cleaner or do-it-all with the Crep Protect kit. Have a favorite pair of kicks that look great but are uncomfortable? Shop for Crep Protect insoles to keep you wrapped in comfort with every step. Designed to keep your kicks looking like new, the Crep Protect line offers a range of products to protect and enhance your sneakers. Whether you’re looking to elevate their comfort or keep them looking as if they’re fresh out of the box, shop for cleaners, fresheners, shields, storage containers and more - trust us, they’re a necessity.
How do I keep my new shoes in good condition?
To ensure your new shoes stay in pristine condition, follow these JD Sports-approved tips:
• Spray them with a waterproof protector to shield against rain and stains.
• Enhance durability by adding Crep Protect Sneaker Guards.
• Alternate between pairs and use products like the Crep Protect Mini Cure Kit for thorough cleaning and care.
• Keep them fresh and comfortable with hose or sock liners.
• Preserve their shape with shoe trees and maintain a polished look with our Boot Cleaner and Care Kit.
How do you take care of sneakers?
For sneaker care that goes the distance, JD Sports recommends:
• Protecting against heat and sunlight to prevent damage.
• Rotate between your favorite pairs and use Crep Protect products for ultimate cleaning and protection.
• Avoid storing wet sneakers to maintain their integrity.
To safeguard your footwear investment, JD Sports suggests:
• Thoroughly cleaning shoes after wear and using Crep Protect Sneaker Guards for added protection.
• Stuffing shoes with acid-free tissue paper or utilizing shoe forms for storage.
• Investing in our Crep Protect Mini Cure Kit for comprehensive care.

Low profile and super sleek, the adidas Stan Smith is an iconoclastic sneaker silhouette that has remained at the top of the tennis shoe game since its release in the 1970s. These authentically retro shoes are still on the market and part of the adidas Home of Classics collection, boasting the same minimal leather upper and pops of color at the tongue and heel. Slip into a pair of adidas Originals Stan Smith casual shoes from JD Sports today and experience the lightweight comfort and retro-inspired style that’s as classic as it is forward-thinking. While the white and green colorway is a popular option among streetwear enthusiasts looking to make a statement on the concrete jungle, JD Sports has a wide variety of colors to choose from. Find all-white leather with pops of red or black, or go daring and bold with an all-black model for an updated look. Not only is this silhouette perfect for street-ready good looks, but it’s impactful enough for the entire family to rock. Shop the latest looks today in men’s, women’s and kids’ sizing! Your budding walker can even get in on the action thanks to models that feature hook-and-loop straps for easy on-and-off. Whether you rock the Stan Smith with a pair of chinos on casual Fridays in the office or with a pair of leggings during weekend run-arounds, rest assured knowing your killer street-ready choice has been a staple for more than four decades and continues to reign king in the casual sneaker world.

Named after the mythical winged horse, the Pegasus line of sneakers from Nike is designed to help you fly—figuratively, of course. The Nike Pegasus family is built with performance in mind, crafted for runners looking to soar past the competition or just beat their own PRs. Standout models like the Nike Pegasus 37 feature Air Zoom cushioning, which delivers a springy feel and plenty of bounce with every single footfall. The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus running shoes comes in men’s, women’s and kids’ sizes, so runners of all ages can get the luxurious feel. The Women’s Pegasus 37 was built specifically for the female foot, with enhanced cushioning at just the right areas so she can get the support needed to float through the miles ahead. If you’re a trail runner, the Nike Pegasus Trail models are a tough option, with aggressive treading and GORE-TEX for protection from the elements and puddles alike. No matter what type of runner you are, there’s a Nike Pegasus model ready for you to lace up and go! Shop JD Sports for the latest Pegasus sneakers to add to your running arsenal.

An old school court icon from Nike hits the streets with these Nike Blazer sneakers. Adding clean, low-profile vibes to your look, they're built with a smooth leather upper. They feature a tonal lace up fastening and a padded ankle collar for all-round comfort. Sat on a lightweight, full-length EVA midsole, these basketball inspired shoes offer all-day comfort, while a herringbone outsole brings grippy traction when you step out. With signature Nike branding to the heel and tongue, they're finished with a bold purple Swoosh logo to the sidewalls. The '77 classic gets refreshed with the Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage. Taking cues from the '70s icon, these mid-profile shoes are packed with retro Nike basketball DNA. They're built with a premium leather and synthetic upper for durable support, and feature a tonal lace up fastening and exposed foam to the tongue for an added throwback feel. In a fresh colorway, they're sat on a tonal midsole that's been treated for a vintage feel. These sneakers have a grippy rubber tread for traction, and are finished up with Nike branding to the tongue and heel, as well as a black Swoosh to the sidewalls.

From their iconic 6-Inch Classic Boots to some of their newer models, Timberland sets the standard for fashion-forward yet rugged boots. Celebrate Michael Jordan's greatness on and off the court when you lace up the Air Jordan 6 Rings from JD Sports. The Jordan 6 Rings basketball shoes pay homage to the GOAT's six championship seasons (1991, 1992, 1993, 1996, 1997 and 1998) by taking elements from each of the sneakers worn in these history-making seasons. True MJ aficionados instantly recognize visuals from iconic sneakers that changed the game — the patent leather midsole from the Air Jordan XI, the distinctive heel loop and lace lock from the Air Jordan VI, and the Air Jordan XIII outsole, to name just a few. With a foundation built from legendary sneakers worn during the most groundbreaking seasons by the most transcendent athletes of all time, these kicks can't lose. These archival classics belong in any sneakerhead's collection with special colorways ranging from black, white and grey neutrals to retro-inspired motifs and contemporary color schemes in men's and kids' sizes. Head to JD Sports today to pay homage to the GOAT and get a piece of the rich Jordan legacy with the Air Jordan 6 Rings Basketball Shoes.

Do women's Converse run big or small?
Converse shoes tend to run large for women. We recommend sizing down by half for the perfect fit.
Why do so many women wear Converse?

For many women, Converse sneakers are favored for their comfort, ease of wear, and trendy appeal. Additionally, their affordability and widespread availability contribute to their popularity among women of all ages.
Which Converse style is popular among women?
The Chuck Taylor All Star stands out as the most iconic and popular Converse style among women.

There’s nothing quite as iconic as the shell toed adidas Superstar shoes. Released in 1969 as a low top basketball shoe, Superstar sneakers became an instant hit on the hardwood and soon, nearly 75% of NBA players were seen rocking these kicks. Because the silhouette easily transitioned from the courts to the streets, Superstars were soon seen everywhere, including on the likes of hip-hop trio RUN-D.M.C. The adidas Originals Superstar sneakers have received accolades spanning five decades, and aren’t stopping anytime soon. These casual shoes are still considered streetwear heavyweights, and offer up the clean court classic look from 1969 with modernized styling and cushioning for today. Shop JD Sports for the latest Superstars in a variety of colors for the entire family. Find men’s, women’s and kids’ sizing options and outfit the fam in the latest gear that turns heads. Plus, JD Sports carries all children’s sizing, including big kids’, little kids’ and toddler. From hook-and-loop closures to iridescent 3-Stripes, your little one is sure to love the sleek street style and comfort of the adidas Superstar.

For gear you can look good in and feel great about, shop JD’s collection of sustainable sportswear from adidas! With decades of experience pushing the limits of athletic performance, the brand continues to create the next generation of footwear and apparel for on-and-off the field, but now with an emphasis on tackling a global issue.

Created with organic materials, innovative dye technology that lowers environmental impact, or recycled content, these products have been meticulously engineered in a more efficient process to keep trash out of our oceans and landfills. Groundbreaking innovations like Primegreen, a fabric containing recycled material and no virgin plastic, and Primeblue material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic utilizes intercepted and recycled virgin plastics from the ocean to help turn a problem into performance.

With eco-conscious iterations of sportswear staples and sustainable adidas sneakers like the Women’s adidas Originals Stan Smith Primegreen, you can master your environmentally-friendly look from head to toe. Whether opting for a t-shirt with a more eco-friendly construction or wearing recycled adidas shoes, no measure is too small as we work together for a greener future. Join the movement today by shopping our curated selection of sustainable adidas shoes and apparel to upgrade your everyday wardrobe while taking a small step towards major change.

What are the best New Balance sneakers for women?

JD Sports recommends the New Balance Fresh Foam X 1080v13 as a top choice for women's running shoes. Featuring a lightweight design and a Fresh Foam X midsole, these shoes provide a soft, cloud-like feel ideal for everyday wear and shorter runs.
Which New Balance sneaker is highly recommended for its durability and comfort for women?

The New Balance 574, highly recommended by JD Sports, stands out for its durability, flexibility, and superior comfort. With a classic yet modern look, these shoes offer excellent arch support and cushioning, making them versatile for various activities.
What retro-inspired sneaker is a favorite among women?

For those who prefer retro-inspired sneakers, the New Balance 327 stands out. Its streamlined design offers a sneaker look with a vintage twist, perfect for casual wear or even in professional settings.
What New Balance sneakers blend performance and style for women?

Blending performance and style, the New Balance 990v5 sneakers are a staple for women's morning runs and fashion-forward looks. Available in multiple colors, these shoes offer both comfort and aesthetic appeal.
Which New Balance sneaker is inspired by 2000s-era models and features superior impact absorption?

Inspired by 2000s-era models, the New Balance 2002R features an ABZORB midsole for superior impact absorption. These sneakers offer a stylish addition to any outfit with their unique shape and texture.
How to Style New Balance Sneakers for Women:
Aside from their comfort, New Balance sneakers are known for their stylish appeal among women. Here are some tips on how to style them:
• Pair with Wide-Leg or Baggy Trousers: Opt for wide-leg or baggy trousers to create a trendy look that maintains balance in your outfit when wearing New Balance sneakers.

• Match with an Oversized Jacket: For a sleek ensemble, pair your New Balance sneakers with an oversized jacket. This creates a clean and modern silhouette that adds a fashionable touch to your outfit.

• Experiment with Unexpected Pairings: Try unexpected pairings like dresses or skirts with your New Balance sneakers for a fashion-forward approach. Coordinate your outfit with a blazer or jacket to elevate the look while keeping it casual and cool.

• Versatile Wardrobe Staple: New Balance sneakers are a versatile wardrobe staple for women that effortlessly transition from gym sessions to everyday wear. Embrace their crossover appeal by incorporating them into various outfits for a stylish and comfortable look.

Let’s face it, kids are tough on shoes. From school to after-school activities to sports, there’s no denying your youngster lives an active lifestyle. Here's where we step in. Doing all of the heavy lifting for you when it comes to scoping out the perfect shoe, JD Sports selection of adaptable models flexes their style power to serve you the looks you've been searching for - without breaking a sweat. From the classics to exclusivity, our goal is to deliver top-quality kids' sneakers that every budding sneakerhead or athlete needs in their collection. Consider us your one-stop-shop for in-demand styles that your youngster just has to have in their evolving rotation. With designs meant for playing and flexing, your kid will love our ever-expanding vault of sneakers. Whether you’re looking for casual kicks that double as trainers, or just want to keep it fresh with our exclusive Global Access models - we have you covered.

Shop our best-in-play selection of high-comfort sneakers. Our top-tier assortment of kids trainers over-delivers when it comes to style, quality and comfort. Their cross-functional designs will keep budding athletes ready to perform and young trendsetters ready to flex. Featuring a roster of athletic kids' shoes for various sports, choose from basketball, running, softball/baseball, soccer and more.
How can I determine my child's shoe size accurately?

We recommend measuring your child's feet regularly, especially before purchasing new shoes. You can use our Kids’ Foot Measuring Guide available on our website. It's essential to measure both feet as they may differ slightly in size.
Is sizing assistance available for kids' shoes?

Absolutely! We provide detailed sizing charts for every brand and style we offer on our website. These charts are invaluable in ensuring you find the perfect fit based on your child's foot measurements. Additionally, our Kids' Fit For Sure program allows you to purchase any kids' shoes online or in-store with confidence, offering free returns if they don't fit.
Are there options for laceless shoes for kids?

JD Sports offers a variety of laceless options for kids, including popular brands like Crocs, Vans, and Nike EasyOn. These shoes feature convenient slip-on designs, making them perfect for young children who are still mastering shoelaces.
What are the benefits of laceless shoes for kids?

Laceless shoes are incredibly convenient for children, especially those who are always on the move. They allow for quick and easy wearing, saving time and frustration for both kids and parents. Additionally, laceless designs often provide a more comfortable fit with less risk of tripping over untied laces.

Find your pace and hit your stride during your daily runs with our collection of women’s running shoes. When it comes to your pavement-pounding or treadmill sessions, not just any pair of kicks will do! That's why we've curated the best running shoes for women in one convenient space so that you can find your ideal combination of cloud-like cushioning, rabid responsiveness, steadfast support, and of course, striking good looks. Sleek, state-of-the-art silhouettes from runner-approved brands like Brooks, Nike, adidas, On Running, New Balance, and more give you ample options to find your signature style and up the tempo on your blistering runs.

Pump up your workout regimen and supercharge your sets with the selection of women's training shoes at JD Sports. No matter your preferred method of earning a good sweat, we've got you covered with help from gym floor sneaker staples by Nike, adidas, Puma, and Reebok. From warm-ups to cool-downs, sneakers like the Nike Air Zoom SuperRep 3 and Reebok Nano X give you the stability, flexibility, and cushioning to keep you fresh throughout your workout. Shop our women's sneakers for training today to meet your new favorite workout partner and re-energize your sweaty sessions.

Nike Metcon Series: This versatile trainer is ideal for weight training, HIIT classes, and light runs. Its stable platform, grippy outsole, and comfortable fit make it a top choice for various workouts.
Brooks Ghost 15: Offering cushioning and support, this shoe is perfect for neutral runners. It provides comfort and smooth transitions, making it suitable for both road and treadmill runs.
What are women's training shoes used for?

Women's training shoes are engineered to accommodate a diverse range of movements, catering to activities like lateral plyometrics, spot squats, and rapid directional changes. Unlike traditional athletic footwear, these shoes feature a flatter sole, reduced heel-to-toe drop, and increased flexibility, offering optimal support and responsiveness during dynamic workouts. Additionally, women's training shoes prioritize stability, ensuring confidence and control across various exercises and training sessions.
Can you wear training shoes for running?

While it's possible to use training shoes for running, it's not always the most suitable choice. At JD Sports, we recommend using running shoes designed specifically for the activity to avoid potential discomfort, decreased performance, and a higher risk of injury.

Way back in the early 1970’s, University of Oregon’s running coach Bill Bowerman needed to solve a problem – Oregon’s Hayward field was transitioning from crushed cinder to an artificial surface and Bowerman needed a running shoe that would get the job done on multiple surfaces. Not long after Bowerman was struck with inspiration – he poured polyurethane into his waffle maker and the rest is history. The humble origins of the Waffle trainer (and Nike) have carried on to this day with shoes like the Nike Waffle One, the Nike Waffle Debut and the Nike Waffle Racer Crater shoes. These modernized versions of the original still rely on that iconic waffle outsole, proving that comfort and quality are timeless. JD Sports has a large selection of men’s and women’s Nike Waffle shoes to choose from, so pick up a pair and step into waffle-inspired comfort today!

With over 60 years in the game, adidas originals continue to blaze the trails with legendary finds. Featuring the beloved designs that started it all, this powerhouse brand with old-school looks and modern-wanted details supplies the style you want with the comfort you demand. Offering a host of simply-stated designs that have an iconic style impact, this sports-born, casual-loved brand has made waves both in the sports and mainstream atmospheres. Ingrained in culture, their athletic-lifestyle fusion brings performance-inspired specs to streetwear, proving that being active doesn’t begin on the court or end in the locker room. With an all-star assortment of pieces heavily influenced by athleticism, these Trefoiled styles continue to dominate the scene with fresh designs and classic vibes.

With a rich storied history, adidas originals shoes continue to blur the lines between performance and street. Continuing to push instant classics that stand the test of time, they capture the original essence of everything you love about the brand with unrefined classics and reimagined staples. Sticking to their heritage roots by riding the nostalgic wave, they deliver tried-and-true designs - such as the legendary Superstar - and redefined staples - like the iconic tennis-inspired Stan Smith. Their growing list of styles ranging from low to high top silhouettes to solid to colorblocked designs complement any mood, style or activity with original comfort and looks. adidas sneakers bring retro-vibes to the older generation and new classics to the younger generation.

Iconic individuality is inherent in the adidas adicolor identity. For those joyous moments you’re radiating with yellow energy or on the days you’re feeling blue, the use of color connects emotion to your every ensemble. This ethos has been echoed through the eras with the ever-expanding spectrum of stunning hues and soft shades that have tinted timeless tracksuits, tees, and numerous other adicolor essentials. Drawing inspiration from colorful culture dating back to the explosive eighties, there is truly a tone for every member that has since been loyal to the Trefoil family. How do I take care of my boots?
For boot longevity and style preservation, follow these JD Sports-approved tips:
• Clean boots after each wear with our Boot Cleaner and Care Kit.
• Ensure proper ventilation and storage away from direct sunlight.
• Regularly utilize products like ForceField Crease Preventers to maintain their structure and integrity.
How do I keep my new shoes in good condition?
To ensure your new shoes stay in pristine condition, follow these JD Sports-approved tips:
• Spray them with a waterproof protector to shield against rain and stains.
• Enhance durability by adding Crep Protect Sneaker Guards.
• Alternate between pairs and use products like the Crep Protect Mini Cure Kit for thorough cleaning and care.
• Keep them fresh and comfortable with hose or sock liners.
• Preserve their shape with shoe trees and maintain a polished look with our Boot Cleaner and Care Kit.

Upgrading your west coast style since 1966, Vans is the OG when it comes to skate shoes and coordinating clothes and accessories. Founded by the Van Doren brothers - Paul and James - along with Gordon Lee, they opened their first store in Anaheim, CA as The Van Doren Rubber Company. It wasn’t long until Vans became the shoe of choice for skateboarders in southern California. Stay right on-trend and always comfortable in cool, laid-back essentials from Vans.

California cool reigns supreme on today’s Vans shoes, with durable construction designed to withstand wear and tear on the half-pipe. Streetwise and oh-so-comfy, Vans Classic Slip-Ons bring the board-worthy vibes in an easy-on package. Dope prints, several colorways and their signature Vans “Off The Wall” heel tab level up these comfy kicks, so you can showcase your casual style. The Vans Old Skool is another fan favorite, with men’s, women’s, and kids’ sizes so everyone in the family can rock skate vibes. These lace-up sneakers feature the iconic Vans side stripe, along with a variety of prints like the unmistakable checkered print that’s a constant in the world of Vans. Some of the kids’ sneakers feature a hook-and-loop strap closure, so kiddos can get a stay-put, easy-on fit—a must when toddlers want to do everything all by themselves! We can't forget about Vans high-top models, either. The Vans Sk8-Hi is a versatile pair of sneakers that come in canvas, textile, or even suede, with quilting at the collar for added comfort. Some of the latest models feature fun animal prints, leveling up the classic kicks with a dash of trend-savvy style.

Once you have your Vans sneakers in all your favorite colors and prints, it’s time to build out a complete ‘fit with Vans clothing and accessories. Vans T-shirts celebrate California’s laid-back mood, with graphic prints that offer bold style. Hoodies and tees with long-sleeves are also a great option for your Vans flavored ‘fit, with premium construction so you stay comfy from the skate park to the boardwalk. For women, Vans leggings are another essential, leveling up your athleisure look with the eye-catching checkered print. Top off your Vans vibe with Vans hats, beanies and snapbacks, with the unforgettable logo at the front. Vans bags and socks complete your head-to-toe skate mood. Shop all of the latest Vans essentials at JD Sports now!

From a performance basketball shoe to a skateboarding favorite to a lifestyle essential, Nike Dunk boasts a rich history that continues to evolve, and no colorway speaks to the Dunk's utility like the Panda Dunks.

Panda Dunks are considered a must-have because of their iconic status, versatility and the reputation they hold across various cultures. Pandas are not just a collector's items but are respected as practical, stylish footwear meant to be worn daily.

Nike's Panda Dunks are versatile due to their simple yet sophisticated black and white colorway, which perfectly complements any style or outfit. The premium white leather upper paired with black leather overlays and the classic sneaker shape ensure these shoes can be be worn with absolutely any outfit.
How do Panda Dunks compare to other Dunk colorways?

Panda Dunks stand out due to their timeless and versatile black-and-white design. While other Dunk colorways may feature bolder colors or unique patterns, the simplicity of the Panda Dunk makes it a staple in sneaker collections.

Yes, Panda Dunks generally fit true to size. However, some wearers may find them slightly narrow, especially if they have wider feet. If you're between sizes or want a roomier fit, consider sizing up half a size.
How can I spot fake Panda Dunks?

To spot fake Panda Dunks, pay attention to the quality of the materials, stitching and overall craftsmanship. Authentic pairs should have high-quality leather, consistent stitching and a well-constructed Nike Swoosh. The tongue tag and insole branding should also be crisp and clear.
Where can I buy Nike Panda Dunks?
Nike Panda Dunks are available at JD Sports.

Shopping for Converse shoes has never been easier thanks to the selection of men’s Converse styles available at JD Sports. In the game since way back in 1917, Converse has become an icon in the sneaker world. JD Sports has classic Chuck Taylor All Star styles and lots of modern choices for the discerning sneakerhead. Whatever style era you’re looking for, you’ll be sure to find a Converse style you love when you shop at JD Sports.
Which Converse shoe is the most comfortable for men?

Converse offers various styles, with the Chuck Taylor All Star and the Chuck 70 being the most popular among men. While the Chuck Taylor All Star boasts a classic design, the Chuck 70 provides enhanced comfort and style features, making it a preferred choice for many male customers.
Should men size up or down in Converse shoes?

Converse shoes typically run larger than average for men. While the brand suggests they fit about half a size bigger, some individuals recommend sizing down a full size for a better fit. It's essential for men to consider the narrowness of certain Converse silhouettes when determining the appropriate size.

Absolutely! Converse shoes, available in both modern and classic varieties, remain a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Whether you're aiming for a dressed-up or casual look, Converse high tops are a perfect choice.
What jeans should men wear with Converse shoes?

To showcase your Converse high tops, opt for skinny or straight-cut blue jeans that hit just above the ankle. This style choice ensures your shoes aren't hidden beneath your jeans, allowing them to stand out.
Check Out the Latest Styles from Top Brands
