One won’t often find a sneaker that has a history that goes as far back as the adidas Samba. Originally designed way back in 1949 by adidas founder and namesake Adi Dassler, the Samba began to pick up in popularity during the 1950 FIFA World Cup in Brazil. It was named after a popular Brazilian dance and music genre, and the rest is pretty much history! Now the adidas Originals Samba has seen a resurgence in popularity as a fashion sneaker, and JD Sports is ready to make sure you can add a pair to your sneaker collection. We have adidas Originals Sambas in black and white colorways so you can grab a pair that is sure to match your unique style. These stay true to the Samba legacy with premium leather, suede overlays and captivating accents that live up to its legendary name by delivering the classic adidas look.

With urban vibes and luxe construction, it’s no wonder these leveled-up staple pieces have been seen on celebrities and influencers across the globe. The idea behind Hoodrich celebrates coming up from nothing into something, and that hustle and heart mantra is carried through in each carefully crafted item. Hoodrich clothing features thoughtfully designed pieces with a touch of street inspo, for items you can wear pretty much anywhere. Hoodrich hoodies and jogger pants make for the perfect ‘fit, or pair a Hoodrich t-shirt with jeans and you’re ready for anything. Don’t sleep on this brand – it’s bringing the heat and shows no signs of cooling down. Cop the latest collection of Hoodrich pieces at JD Sports today!

What's the difference between Nike Air Max and other Nike shoes?

Key Difference: Nike Air Max shoes feature visible or hidden air pockets in the sole for enhanced cushioning and responsiveness. Regular Nike shoes might have different cushioning technologies, but not the signature Nike Air unit.
• Nike Air Max shoes: Like walking on marshmallows, ideal for high-impact activities like running.
• Other Nike shoes: Can have comfortable padding, but the focus is usually on different aspects like support or flexibility.
More differences between Nike Air Max and other Nike shoes:
• Design: Nike Air Max shoes often have bolder, statement styles due to the visible air unit.
• Price: Air Max models tend to be pricier due to the advanced technology.
Are Nike Air Max shoes good for walking?
Yes, Air Max shoes can be excellent for walking! The cushioning reduces impact on your joints, making long walks more comfortable. However, keep in mind:
• Model matters: Some Air Max shoes, like the Nike Air Max 95, can be bulky and less flexible for walking compared to lighter, sleeker models like the Nike Air Max 1.
• Personal preference: Some people prefer a firmer sole for walking, while others enjoy the extra bounce of Air Max.
What’s the difference between the Nike Air Max 90 and the Nike Air Max 95?
• Sleek and versatile: Streamlined design with visible air unit blends into various styles.
• Performance-oriented: Originally designed for running, boasts good flexibility and responsiveness.
• Rich history: First Nike Air Max shoe with visible air, holds a special place in the sneaker world.
• Bold and futuristic: Eye-catching design with exposed air unit and wavy overlays makes a statement.
• Maximum cushioning: Visible air unit from heel to toe offers plush comfort for all-day wear.
• Cultural icon: Associated with 90s hip-hop, holds a distinct place in pop culture.
• Nike Air Max 90: Your reliable daily driver, comfortable and stylish for any occasion.
• Nike Air Max 95: Your showstopper sneakers, perfect for making a statement and embracing bold comfort.
Ultimately, the best choice depends on your personal style and priorities. Do you seek versatility and performance? Go for the 90. Craving maximum comfort and a cool factor? The 95 awaits.
Is the Nike Air Max 270 versatile?
Yes, the Nike Air Max 270 is a very versatile shoe! Here is why:
• Walk the clouds: Air Max 270's cushioning isn't just flashy, it's like walking on pillows. Perfect for exploring the city, hitting the gym, or just cruising in style.

• Don't judge by the chunk! The 270's sleek upper goes from chill vibes with joggers to edgy chic with leather. Feeling daring? Pair them with a skirt and steal the show with unexpected comfort and confidence.
• Whether you like neutrals, pop of vibrant color, or monotone - the 270's palette is your oyster. Express yourself with the perfect hue, or mix and match for a unique statement.

The Nike Air Max 270 is more than just a shoe––it's your comfort and style playground. Step into a world where boundaries blur and your personal style shines. Your feet will thank you, and your wardrobe will never be the same.

Yes, Air Max shoes can be excellent for walking! The cushioning reduces impact on your joints, making long walks more comfortable. However, keep in mind:
Model matters: Some Air Max shoes, like the Nike Air Max 95, can be bulky and less flexible for walking compared to lighter, sleeker models like the Nike Air Max 1.
Personal preference: Some people prefer a firmer sole for walking, while others enjoy the extra bounce of Air Max.
What’s the difference between the Nike Air Max 90 and the Nike Air Max 95?
Sleek and versatile: Streamlined design with visible air unit blends into various styles.
Performance-oriented: Originally designed for running, boasts good flexibility and responsiveness.
Rich history: First Nike Air Max shoe with visible air, holds a special place in the sneaker world.
Bold and futuristic: Eye-catching design with exposed air unit and wavy overlays makes a statement.
Maximum cushioning: Visible air unit from heel to toe offers plush comfort for all-day wear.
Cultural icon: Associated with 90s hip-hop, holds a distinct place in pop culture.
Nike Air Max 90: Your reliable daily driver, comfortable and stylish for any occasion.
Nike Air Max 95: Your showstopper sneakers, perfect for making a statement and embracing bold comfort.
Ultimately, the best choice depends on your personal style and priorities. Do you seek versatility and performance? Go for the 90. Craving maximum comfort and a cool factor? The 95 awaits.
Is the Nike Air Max 270 versatile?
Yes, the Nike Air Max 270 is a very versatile shoe! Here is why:
Walk the clouds: Air Max 270's cushioning isn't just flashy, it's like walking on pillows. Perfect for exploring the city, hitting the gym, or just cruising in style.

Don't judge by the chunk! The 270's sleek upper goes from chill vibes with joggers to edgy chic with leather. Feeling daring? Pair them with a skirt and steal the show with unexpected comfort and confidence.
Whether you like neutrals, pop of vibrant color, or monotone - the 270's palette is your oyster. Express yourself with the perfect hue, or mix and match for a unique statement.

The Nike Air Max 270 is more than just a shoe––it's your comfort and style playground. Step into a world where boundaries blur and your personal style shines. Your feet will thank you, and your wardrobe will never be the same.

Flexibility and stability combine to create the Nike Metcon 4 shoes. These training sneakers are built to keep you comfortable during even your most demanding workouts. They feature a tough yet breathable “chain-link” mesh upper, a rubber-striped sidewall that hugs the heel for stability, a wide heel that creates a solid base for lifting, a soft foam core that provides ample cushioning with a firm outer layer that provides stability, wide internal webbing that distributes pressure for a comfortable and secure feel during sudden starts and stops, and Nike Free technology in the forefoot that allows for maximum agility during exercises like sprints, burpees and planks.

What is adidas' most iconic shoe for men?

The adidas Superstar stands as one of the most iconic shoes for men since its debut in 1970. Renowned for its distinctive rubber shell toe and leather upper, the Superstar continues to be a top choice for many male consumers, with approximately 85% of professional basketball players in the US opting to wear it on the court.
Which Adidas men’s running shoes are considered the best?

The adidas Ultraboost Light is one of our top picks for men's running shoes. Featuring a lighter iteration of Boost foam and sustainable materials like Parley Ocean Yarn and recycled polyester in the upper, it combines style with eco-consciousness. What is adidas' most iconic shoe for men?

Boost your performance and take your training to the next level in adidas Boost shoes. Ultra-comfortable and designed to give you the cloud-like comfort you need to excel, this cushioning technology is a true must-have for all the ways you move. Your feet will love the ride in any sneaker that features Boost, ensuring you’ll want to reach for them again and again. A mainstay in the adidas line-up of performance and everyday footwear, this icon has been changing the athletic footwear game since 2013. With its impressive propulsion and pillowy feel, there’s no stopping you when you’re wearing adidas Boost shoes.

Innovative. Premium. Game-changing. All words that aptly describe this groundbreaking technology. Originally built to take running performance to impressive new heights, Boost took the running world by storm when it first hit the scene. But runners weren’t the only people who took notice. In fact, the whole world saw that not only did adidas Boost shoes feel amazing, but they looked good, too! German chemists and the adidas Innovation Team had no idea that this new foam cushioning would wow everyone when they sought to combine two opposing features—responsive and soft. Prior to this meeting of the minds, EVA foam was ruling the running shoe world. The design team behind Boost switched up the status quo by combining thousands of tiny particles that expanded and worked in conjunction to give the wearer a rush of energy return with every single step.

Today, Boost can be found on a wide range of adidas models. Running mainstays like the UltraBOOST line continue to feature the coveted tech, and new models of this sneaker—like the UltraBOOST DNA and the UltraBOOST 4.0—continue to roll out. Collabs with NASA, Disney and other favorites have also made the UltraBOOST line an essential for runners and non-runners alike. The adidas Boost sneaker collection runs deep with casual models, too. A sneaker that made massive waves when it first came out, the adidas NMD R1 brought Boost cushioning to a trend-savvy casual silhouette. Offered in men’s, women’s, boys' and girls' sizes, the NMD line has a streetwise look and pro-worthy technology for everyday wear. Other essential Boost models include the ZX 2K Boost line, which features bold colors and designs for all ages. Shop the latest adidas Boost shoes at JD Sports for game-changing cushioning and support in a stylish package!

Trying to buy a new pair of basketball shoes can be intimidating. Whether it's fit, style, or even brand, it’s hard to know which shoe is best for you. Here is some information that might help:
1. What is the difference between Men’s and Women’s basketball shoes?

Size and Fit: Historically, men's basketball shoes tend to be wider and larger compared to women's basketball shoes to accommodate the anatomical differences between men's and women's feet. However, this is changing as more shoe manufacturers recognize the diversity in foot shapes and sizes, offering a broader range of sizes and widths for both men's and women's shoes. The same goes for boys' basketball shoes vs girls' basketball shoes. 
Cushioning: There are some differences in cushioning depending on the shoe. Men's shoes often account for the additional weight men typically carry compared to women.
Support: Both men's and women's shoes offer ankle support, but some women's shoes have a slightly different fit around the ankle to accommodate the narrower foot profile.
Durability: Both shoes are made from high-quality materials and are built to last.
Color and Design: While not always the case, there can be differences in color schemes and designs between men's and women's basketball shoes. Women's shoes may feature more vibrant colors or patterns that cater to women's fashion preferences, though this is becoming less common as gender-neutral designs gain popularity.
2. Should I get high top or low top basketball shoes?

Whether you should get high-top or low-top basketball shoes depends on several factors, including your playing style, ankle stability, and personal preference. Here are some considerations to help you decide:

Ankle Support: High-top basketball shoes traditionally offer more ankle support due to their extended collar that covers the ankle. If you have a history of ankle injuries or prefer the feeling of having your ankles supported, high-top shoes might be a better choice for you.
Mobility and Flexibility: Low-top basketball shoes provide more freedom of movement around the ankle, which can be beneficial for players who prioritize agility, quick cuts, and speed on the court. If you rely on your agility and speed and feel restricted by high-top shoes, low-tops might be the way to go.
Injury History: If you've experienced ankle injuries in the past, high-top shoes might offer added peace of mind and stability. However, it's essential to address any underlying issues with strength, flexibility, and technique rather than solely relying on shoe choice for injury prevention.
Comfort: Ultimately, your comfort in the shoes is crucial. Try on both high-top and low-top shoes and see which style feels better on your feet. Comfort plays a significant role in performance and can help prevent discomfort or distractions during games.
3. Which NBA players have shoe deals?
There are dozens of NBA players with signature shoe deals, but here are some of the most popular:

Lebron James: King James reigns supreme in the sneaker world with his lifetime Nike basketball deal, reportedly worth over $1 billion. LeBron's signature line prioritizes stability and maximum support, often featuring innovative cushioning and a mix of bold and classic colorways.
James Harden: James Harden has a signature shoe line with Adidas called the ""Harden Vol."" series. These were designed in collaboration with Adidas and Harden himself and emphasize lightweight, breathable designs for agility on the court, often featuring bold colorways and signature details.
Kevin Durant: Kevin Durant has a lifetime deal with Nike, one of the most exclusive athlete partnerships in the industry. The KD signature line is known for its supportive structure and responsive cushioning, perfect for Durant's powerful playing style, and often incorporates sleek designs with personalized touches referencing his life and career.
Steph Curry: Steph Curry is a signature athlete for Under Armour Basketball with a groundbreaking deal that extends beyond his playing career. Curry's signature line, known for its lightweight, breathable materials and innovative cushioning like UA Flow, is built for his lightning-quick style and pinpoint shooting.
Giannis Antetokounmpo: Giannis Antetokounmpo has a long-term deal with Nike, with shoes designed to withstand his aggressive playing style. Giannis' signature line prioritizes durability and strong ankle support, featuring thick outsoles and materials that can handle his dominant movements on the court.
Damian Lillard (Dame): Damian Lillard and adidas Basketball have a lucrative long-term deal, and his Dame line emphasizes responsiveness and court feel for his lightning-fast playing style. The Dame shoes are known for their breathable materials, supportive features, and often come in colorways inspired by Lillard's nickname, ""Dame Dolla.""

From the streets of Oakland as an unheralded basketball player to the most feared player in the clutch, Damian Lillard’s ascent to the top of the basketball world has been marked by hard work, determination, and a relentless dedication to taking his game to new levels. The adidas Dame basketball shoes are built to continue blazing his trail to legendary status while remembering what it took to get there in the first place. Known for his limitless range and seemingly supernatural clutch ability with the game on the line, the man dubbed Big Game Dame needs supportive kicks to match his explosive game and keep him fresh while opponents are on their last legs.

If you thought the six-time All-Star and Olympic gold medalist would stop now, then you don’t know the story of Dame. To help him continue his meteoric rise, adidas Basketball engineered the Dame 8 to be quicker and more responsive to meet the demands of one of the most unpredictable and dynamic players on the planet. Is he pulling up from 30 feet? Is he blowing by a defender and rising above the help defense on his way to another highlight-reel dunk? The Dame 8 empowers its namesake to do either with Bounce Pro cushioning for ideal energy return and support and a grippy traction outsole for stop-on-a-dime agility to give him an edge on the court. Draped in captivating colorways designed to match your team’s uniforms and pay homage to Dame’s favorite activities like rapping and boxing in the offseason, these Dame shoes capture his game and personality so you can turn any time into Dame Time.

Command the court and stamp your personality on the game in the adidas Dame 7. Arriving in a variety of special colorways as bold as Dame’s game, this performance basketball shoe pays homage to Dame’s inspirations and heroes on and off the court. Lightstrike cushioning and an engineered knit upper with supportive overlays join forces for lightweight support that’s built to last, so you can play indoor or outdoor and never run from the grind. Pick up your pair of Damian Lillard shoes today to take command of the court and take the next step of your own rise to the top.

When it comes to street smart sneakers, it doesn't get much better than adidas UltraBoost. A collection of street-smart sneakers designed to take you from casual to performance, the adidas UltraBOOST line is all about functional swag. UltraBOOST running shoes are built with a clean, fresh innovative design that incorporates the iconic BOOST midsole for unparalleled energy return with a plush, springy feel. Built with sustainable Primeblue material to help reduce plastic waste, they feature stabilizing Tailored Fiber Placement stitching for a precise, smooth stride. With a variety of designs made to meet your every demand when it comes to style, feel and fit, the UltraBOOST 21 incorporates a modified Torsion system for an enhanced, responsive run and increased BOOST technology for amplified energy return. The UltraBOOST 4.0 model is made for those with speed in their DNA. Great for jogs, sprints and races, their lightweight ventilated design sticks to tried-and-true features to make you feel like you're running on air. While the UltraBOOST 5.0 design puts comfortable support in the forefront with a snug, sock-like fit and a Stretchweb sole crafted with Continental™ Rubber for natural, grippy traction. No matter what your running style is, UltraBOOST sneakers have you covered. With sizes available for men, kids’ and women, make UltraBOOST sneakers the official family shoe. Designed for function and loved for casual wear, rock them for the ultimate style flex or for performance. With their clean, versatile looks and unparalleled comfort-enhancing technology, shop for classic black, white or neutral tones, amp it up with vibrant pops of color or mix-it-up with bold hues - no matter where you're going, make sure when you step on the scene your drip is comfortably on-point.

Back in 1996 Brooks offered runners support through what were called motion-control shoes, which were designed to help runners and walkers whose bodies deviated from their natural motion paths. They soon learned, however, that this level of support was too much for many runners and walkers. And so the Brooks Adrenaline GTS was created with the mission to help runners remain in their natural stride without overcorrection. Back in the present, the Brooks Adrenaline running shoes have become a favorite with runners around the world thanks to their innovative and comfortable technology. The Brooks Adrenaline GTS 22 running shoes feature GuideRail support technology to reduce excess movement, a 100% DNA Loft midsole for a soft and smooth feel, and a Segmented Crash Pad for super smooth transitions during your runs. JD Sports offers Brooks Adrenaline GTS 22 shoes in both men’s and women’s sizes, so grab a pair for yourself or as a gift for the runner in your life today!

Whether you’re in training for a race or just lacing them up for a jog around the block, the Brooks Ghost Running Shoes are built to support your workouts. These lightweight and plush running sneakers are one of Brooks’s most popular models, and the newest edition – the Brooks Ghost 14 – is the brand’s first fully carbon-neutral shoe as part of an effort to reduce manufacturing emissions.

But what is it like to wear? Breathable uppers with 3D fit Print hug your feet and adjust to the wearer for a secure, comfortable fit every time. The Brooks Ghost family uses DNA LOFT cushioning technology, a blend of foam, rubber and air, that delivers lightweight comfort and support so you can remain confident in every stride you take. That soft, uniform midsole also helps to deliver smooth transitions from heel to toe, ensuring that your effort is maximized with every step.

If you’re ready to enhance your running workouts on the treadmill or the street, you can find Brooks Ghost Running Shoes in a range of colorways for Men and Women at JD Sports, in stores and online.

New Balance shoes are known for their comfortable, fashionable and true-to-size fit. New Balance offers a wide range of styles in various widths to accommodate all foot shapes and activities. The brand's sizing guide provides a comprehensive overview of their sizing system, including length and width measurements for men's, women's, and children's shoes. And when it comes to your perfect 'fit, here are some tips for choosing the right pair New Balance shoes:
1. How do New Balance shoes fit?

New Balance shoes are designed to fit snugly but not tightly. The toe box should provide enough room for your toes to wiggle freely, while the heel should fit securely without slipping. The arch support should be comfortable and provide adequate support for your feet. If you are between sizes, it is generally recommended to go with the larger size. You can also try on different widths to find the best fit for your feet.
2. What are the best New Balance shoes for everyday wear?

While all of these shoes are comfortable for everyday wear, we think the New Balance 574 and 327 are the best. New Balance 574 and 327 are two of the brand's most popular lifestyle sneakers, each offering a unique blend of style and comfort. The 574's timeless design and durable construction make it a wardrobe staple, while the 327's lightweight comfort and adaptability make it great for everyday wear.

• Versatility: The 574's timeless design complements various outfits and styles, making it a wardrobe staple. Its neutral color options blend with casual attire, while bolder hues add a touch of personality to everyday ensembles.
• Comfort: The 574's construction prioritizes comfort, featuring a cushioned EVA midsole that provides shock absorption and support throughout the day, and the breathable upper allows for airflow.
• Durability: The durable rubber outsole provides excellent traction on various surfaces, and the reinforced stitching ensures longevity.
• Lightweight Comfort: The 327 is surprisingly light, making it comfortable for daily activities. The cushioned EVA midsole provides ample support without weighing you down, ensuring all-day comfort.
• Adaptability: The 327's versatile design pairs well with various styles, from casual streetwear to more formal outfits.
3. What is the difference between the 997 and the 2002R?

Design: The 997 has a more streamlined and modern design, while the 2002R has a more chunky and retro design.
Comfort: The 997 is slightly more cushioned than the 2002R, but both shoes are comfortable for everyday wear.
Support: The 2002R has slightly better arch support than the 997.
Durability: Both shoes are made from high-quality materials and are built to last.
Overall: The best shoe for you will depend on your personal preferences. If you prefer a more modern design, the 997 is a good choice. If you prefer a more chunky and retro design with better arch support, the 2002R is the shoe for you.
4. What is the difference between the New Balance 550 and the New Balance 574?

There are several differences between the 550 and the 574. The New Balance 550 is a more stylish and fashion-forward with a basketball-inspired design, premium leather or suede upper, and herringbone traction pattern. The New Balance 574 is a more versatile and comfortable option with a classic running shoe design, mesh and suede upper, and versatile tread pattern.
• New Balance 550: Basketball-inspired with a sleek, low-profile silhouette
• New Balance 574: Classic running shoe with a more rounded and chunky silhouette
• New Balance 550: Premium leather or suede upper for a luxurious feel
• New Balance 574: Mesh and suede upper for breathability and comfort
• New Balance 550: EVA midsole for lightweight cushioning and support
• New Balance 574: EVA midsole for lightweight cushioning and everyday comfort
• New Balance 550: Herringbone(zig-zag) traction for better grip on smooth surfaces
• New Balance 574: Versatile tread pattern for everyday wear
• New Balance 550: Stylish, retro, and slightly more fashion-forward
• New Balance 574: Versatile, comfortable, and a true New Balance classic
5. How do I style the New Balance 9060?

The New Balance 9060 is a multifunctional sneaker that transitions from casual outings to formal settings. Its stylish design complements various looks, and its lightweight construction and comfortable cushioning ensure all-day comfort.

Casual Cool: Pair the New Balance 9060 with denim jeans, a simple T-shirt, and a lightweight jacket for a casual look. Complete the fit with a baseball cap or beanie.
Elevated Athleisure: Elevate your athleisure style by teaming the New Balance 9060 with tailored sweatpants, a crewneck sweatshirt, and a bomber jacket. Add color with a vibrant hoodie or graphic tee.
Retro Flair: Embrace the retro vibes of the New Balance 9060 by pairing it with wide-leg corduroy pants, a vintage-inspired graphic tee, and a denim jacket. Accessorize with a statement necklace or scarf.
Smart Casual: Transition the New Balance 9060 into a smart casual setting by pairing it with dark-wash chinos, a crisp button-down shirt and a structured blazer.
Bold Statement: Make a bold statement by pairing the New Balance 9060 with vibrant color-blocked clothing, such as a color-coordinated tracksuit or a patterned shirt and shorts set.

Vans Collection: Find Your Perfect Pair

Upgrading your west coast style since 1966, Vans is the OG when it comes to skate shoes and coordinating clothes and accessories. Founded by the Van Doren brothers - Paul and James - along with Gordon Lee, they opened their first store in Anaheim, CA as The Van Doren Rubber Company. It wasn’t long until Vans became the shoe of choice for skateboarders in southern California. Stay right on-trend and always comfortable in cool, laid-back essentials from Vans.

California cool reigns supreme on today’s Vans shoes, with durable construction designed to withstand wear and tear on the half-pipe. Streetwise and oh-so-comfy, Vans Classic Slip-Ons bring the board-worthy vibes in an easy-on package. Dope prints, several colorways and their signature Vans “Off The Wall” heel tab level up these comfy kicks, so you can showcase your casual style. The Vans Old Skool is another fan favorite, with men’s, women’s, and kids’ sizes so everyone in the family can rock skate vibes. These lace-up sneakers feature the iconic Vans side stripe, along with a variety of prints like the unmistakable checkered print that’s a constant in the world of Vans. Some of the kids’ sneakers feature a hook-and-loop strap closure, so kiddos can get a stay-put, easy-on fit—a must when toddlers want to do everything all by themselves! We can't forget about Vans high-top models, either. The Vans Sk8-Hi is a versatile pair of sneakers that come in canvas, textile, or even suede, with quilting at the collar for added comfort. Some of the latest models feature fun animal prints, leveling up the classic kicks with a dash of trend-savvy style.

Once you have your Vans sneakers in all your favorite colors and prints, it’s time to build out a complete ‘fit with Vans clothing and accessories. Vans T-shirts celebrate California’s laid-back mood, with graphic prints that offer bold style. Hoodies and tees with long-sleeves are also a great option for your Vans flavored ‘fit, with premium construction so you stay comfy from the skate park to the boardwalk. For women, Vans leggings are another essential, leveling up your athleisure look with the eye-catching checkered print. Top off your Vans vibe with Vans hats, beanies and snapbacks, with the unforgettable logo at the front. Vans bags and socks complete your head-to-toe skate mood. Shop all of the latest Vans essentials at JD Sports now!

When technology and style meet at the forefront of sport fashion, you know who to turn to: Nike. Founded in 1964 by the legendary Phil Knight and Bill Bowerman, Nike was first known to the world as Blue Ribbon Sports. The company rebranded in 1971 to Nike, named after the Greek goddess of victory. For decades, Nike has been a leader in sneaker innovation with its start in the running shoe world. But, what really set them apart was the introduction of Nike Air. Air innovation was introduced in 1979 and consists of pockets of pressurized air inside a durable, flexible bag. These units provide an elastic-like feel while reducing hard impact and keeping you light on your feet. Now, Nike Air sits underfoot on dozens of silhouettes, reducing impact, keeping you light on your feet and providing that springy bounce you know and love.

With the introduction and implementation of Air came the line of Nike Air Max sneaker styles. Built for the streets, but offering up the cushioned comfort you love, these sneakers are every streetwear enthusiast’s dream. You’re probably already familiar with the Nike Air Max family, which spans decades of time and includes dozens of silhouettes. Classic sneakers like the Air Max 90 and Air Max 95 live on in infamy, with Nike updating and upgrading styles year-round to keep a fresh outlook on street style. Newer models like the Nike Air Max 270 have changed the game for modern sneakerheads.

Aside from Nike Air, Nike has introduced additional cushioning technology that makes running even more comfortable for veterans and novices alike. From Nike React Foam that’s as resilient as it is lightweight to VaporMax Air that brings the gravity-defying bounce you crave, Nike launches the best of the best. Experience new technology like Nike Joyride, Nike Renew and more in running sneakers that are lightweight, durable and ready to put in the miles. Whether you’re a budding baller who needs a pair of basketball sneakers for the hardwood, a sneakerhead whose shoe collection is never fully complete or a running aficionado who needs the very best technology to help hit new PR’s, shop JD for Nike shoes, sport fashion apparel and accessories to help lead the way.

VaporMax Air is the next evolution of Nike Air technology. While Air generally sat inside the midsole for extreme cushioning, VaporMax takes it up a notch as a standalone outsole that does everything in one. This heel-to-toe cushioning is lighter-than-air and provides a gravity-defying bounce that you can feel with every step. Take a peek at the exaggerated lugs on the outsole to see the Air that makes the difference. Once these lugs are pushed to create pressure, the bounce back release is out of this world. Plus, durability isn’t forgotten – these rubber-like pods offer up plenty of traction for everyday wear and tear. Thanks to the innovative VaporMax Air technology, runners can now experience heel-to-toe cushioning that’s soft, springy and lightweight.

Step out in some of Nike’s latest styles, like the VaporMax Plus, VaporMax Flyknit 3, or the Vapormax 2020 and experience Nike’s iconic Air technology in a brand-new way. The VaporMax Flyknit 3 is seven years in the making and offers up premium Nike technologies including VaporMax and a Flyknit upper. Built for runners, this versatile running shoe has a stylish design that has taken the streets by storm, too. The Nike Air VaporMax Plus is a hybrid sneaker that offers up extreme comfort for everyday use and is a direct nod to the Air Max Plus of 1998. Step into a pair of Nike Air VaporMax sneakers and experience the feeling of running on air and unmatched comfort like never before. Wear these icons running, training or on the streets for a standout look that brings the comfort and modern style you crave.

Elevate your game from the streets to the court with the best men's basketball shoes from JD Sports. In a sport where every moment counts, the right pair of basketball sneakers can give you the edge to outplay the competition. We’ve curated a selection of top-performing basketball shoes to help you find the perfect pair. Choose from renowned brands like Nike, Jordan, adidas, Under Armour, and more to keep you quick on your feet and fully supported with every move. Step into the signature basketball shoe styles of NBA greats like LeBron James, Giannis Antetokounmpo, Kevin Durant, and Stephen Curry. Honor the legends with iconic basketball sneakers like the adidas Harden Vol. 8, Nike Air More Uptempo, and retro Jordans inspired by the greatest player of all time. Find the basketball shoes that suit your style and performance, with JD Sports as your go-to source for premium basketball footwear.

Q: What are the best basketball shoes for performance?
A: The best basketball shoes offer support, traction, and cushioning. Popular options include Nike LeBron, adidas Harden, and Air Jordan models, favored for their performance and durability on the court.

Q: What type of shoes are best for basketball?
A: Basketball shoes should offer ankle support, cushioning, and a firm grip. High-tops provide extra ankle protection, while mid and low-tops focus more on speed and flexibility.

Q: How are basketball shoes different from regular sneakers?
A: Basketball shoes are designed with extra ankle support, cushioning, and grip to handle the fast-paced movements and jumps of the game, whereas regular sneakers are often more lightweight and casual.

Q: What are the most popular basketball shoes in the NBA?
A: Some of the most commonly worn shoes in the NBA include Nike LeBron, Air Jordan, and the Nike Zoom Freak, worn by top players for their performance and support.

Q: What are the most common basketball shoes used in the NBA?
A: Top NBA players often wear shoes like Nike LeBron, Jordan Retro series, and Nike Giannis Immortality. These shoes are known for their combination of comfort, performance, and style.

Q: Can basketball shoes be worn casually?
A: Absolutely! Many people wear basketball shoes casually, especially models like Air Jordans and Nike Dunks, which have become streetwear staples.

Q: What are some affordable yet well-constructed basketball shoes?
A: Budget-friendly basketball shoes with solid performance include the Nike Giannis Immortality, Nike Renew Elevate, and Nike Court Vision, all known for durability and value.
Want to keep the momentum going? Check out these other frequently asked questions that’ll take your game to the next level!
